channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Harvest SCM Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Harvest SCM Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2131|2024-08-04T07:01:40.876Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20harvest%20scm%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Harvest SCM Plugin 0.5.1 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2020-2130|2024-08-04T07:01:40.936Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20harvest%20scm%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Harvest SCM Plugin 0.5.1 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where it can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.
